summary: Enhanced AGENTS.md with comprehensive project structure, development workflow, testing, deployment, and troubleshooting sections. Added quick reference commands, module documentation, and agent-friendly integration guides.
changes: Added Project Structure section with core components and key modules table
Added Dependencies section listing async, database, crypto, ML, and utils dependencies
Added Development Workflow section with building, key commands, and CLI options
Added Testing section with structure, running tests, and test categories
Added Deployment section with production build, Docker, system dependencies, and data directories
Added Library Usage section with basic integration and Zesty convenience API examples
Added Common Patterns section for decision workflow and swarm integration
Added Troubleshooting section with build issues, runtime issues, and performance issues
assumptions: Project uses standard Rust development practices (cargo build/test/fmt/clippy)
Testing follows Rust conventions with tokio-test for async tests
ONNX Runtime is required for semantic embeddings functionality
SQLite database with bundled rusqlite works on all platforms
Docker deployment follows standard Rust containerization patterns
